Package us.radiri.merc.gfx

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Batcher
    An abstraction for batchers.
    Graphics
    An abstraction for all graphics.
    Textured
    An abstraction for objects that are textured.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Animation
    An easy to use animation class.
    Camera
    An object for the camera.
    Color
    A class for Color, that will hold the three values; r, g, b, and a, and will darken, brighten, multiply, etc.
    FrameBuffer  
    Shader
    An object version of shaders.
    SpriteSheet  
    SubTexture  
    Texture
    An object version of a texture.
    VAOBatcher
    A very simple batcher.
    VAOBatcher.VertexData  
    VAOGraphics
    An object used for graphics.
    VAOUtils
    A utilities class for vertex array objects.
